Test Scenario Description: Verify login with valid email and password
Test Steps:
1. Open Facebook login page
2. Enter valid email and password
3. Click on Login button
Expected Result: User should log in successfully and be redirected to the homepage.
Actual Result: User logged in successfully and redirected to homepage.

Test Scenario Description: Verify login with valid phone number and password
Test Steps:
1. Open Facebook login page
2. Enter valid phone number and password
3. Click on Login
Expected Result: User should log in successfully using phone credentials.

Test Scenario Description: Verify the 'Show Password' button displays password text when clicked
Test Steps:
1. Enter password
2. Click on Show Password icon
Expected Result: Password text should become visible.
Actual Result: Show Password button not functioning properly.

Test Scenario Description: Verify 'Forgot Password' functionality redirects to reset page
Test Steps:
1. Click on 'Forgot Password'
2. Enter registered email
3. Submit reset request
Expected Result: Password reset page should appear and reset email should be sent.

Test Scenario Description: Verify 'Remember Me' checkbox stores credentials for future sessions
Test Steps:
1. Check Remember Me
2. Log in
3. Logout and reopen login page
Expected Result: Email/Phone field should auto-fill with last credentials.
Actual Result: Remember Me not storing credentials properly.

Test Scenario Description: Verify the 'Login' button becomes enabled only after valid input
Test Steps:
1. Open login page
2. Leave fields empty
3. Check Login button
4. Fill valid fields
Expected Result: Login button should activate only when both fields are filled.
Actual Result: Button enabled correctly only after valid input.

Test Scenario Description: Verify 'Logout' functionality logs the user out successfully
Test Steps:
1. Log in
2. Click on profile menu
3. Select Logout
Expected Result: User should be logged out and redirected to login screen.

Test Scenario Description: Verify 'Create New Account' link opens the signup form
Test Steps: 1. Click on 'Create New Account' link
Expected Result: Signup form should appear.

Test Scenario Description: Verify login works across multiple browsers
Test Steps: 1. Perform login on Chrome, Edge, Firefox
Expected Result: Login should succeed on all browsers.
Actual Result: Login successful on all tested browsers.

Test Scenario Description: Verify login page loads within acceptable time (under 3s)
Test Steps:
1. Load login page
2. Measure page load time
Expected Result: Page should load under 3 seconds.

Test Scenario Description: Verify password input field is masked by default
Test Steps:
1. Open login page
2. Observe password input field
Expected Result: Password characters should be hidden by default.

Test Scenario Description: Verify login page UI is responsive across devices
Test Steps: 1. Open login page on desktop, tablet, mobile
Expected Result: Layout should adjust correctly on all devices.
Actual Result: UI is responsive and aligned correctly.

Test Scenario Description: Verify system rejects invalid email format
Test Steps:
1. Enter invalid email (e.g. user@)
2. Enter valid password
3. Click Login
Expected Result: Validation error should be displayed for invalid email.
Actual Result: Invalid email accepted without validation message.

Test Scenario Description: Verify error message for incorrect password
Test Steps:
1. Enter valid email and incorrect password
2. Click Login
Expected Result: Error message should display 'Incorrect password'.

Test Scenario Description: Verify system behavior when non-existent account is entered
Test Steps:
1. Enter unregistered email
2. Click Login
Expected Result: Error should display 'Account not found'.

Test Scenario Description: Verify login behavior when email field is empty
Test Steps:
1. Leave email empty
2. Enter password
3. Click Login
Expected Result: Prompt should ask to enter email.

Test Scenario Description: Verify login behavior when password field is empty
Test Steps:
1. Enter valid email
2. Leave password empty
3. Click Login
Expected Result: Prompt should ask to enter password.

Test Scenario Description: Verify login behavior when both fields are empty
Test Steps:
1. Leave both fields empty
2. Click Login
Expected Result: Error should display for missing inputs.

Test Scenario Description: Verify SQL injection attempt in login fields
Test Steps:
1. Enter `' OR '1'='1` in email field
2. Click Login
Expected Result: Input should be rejected; error message displayed.

Test Scenario Description: Verify system prevents XSS attacks via input fields
Test Steps:
1. Enter `<script>alert('test')</script>` in email field
2. Click Login
Expected Result: System should sanitize and block script.

Test Scenario Description: Verify login with deactivated account
Test Steps:
1. Enter deactivated user credentials
2. Click Login
Expected Result: Error: Account deactivated.

Test Scenario Description: Verify behavior for excessively long passwords
Test Steps:
1. Enter 100-character long password
2. Click Login
Expected Result: System should reject long input gracefully.

Test Scenario Description: Verify trimming of whitespaces in email input
Test Steps:
1. Enter email with leading/trailing spaces
2. Click Login
Expected Result: Spaces should be trimmed automatically.

Test Scenario Description: Verify autofill with outdated credentials
Test Steps:
1. Autofill old credentials
2. Click Login
Expected Result: System should prompt for new credentials.

Test Scenario Description: Verify validation for invalid phone number format
Test Steps:
1. Enter invalid phone format
2. Click Login
Expected Result: Error should display for invalid phone number.

Test Scenario Description: Verify password is case-sensitive
Test Steps:
1. Enter correct email but different password case
2. Click Login
Expected Result: Login should fail due to case sensitivity.

Test Scenario Description: Verify login attempt without internet connection
Test Steps:
1. Disconnect internet
2. Enter valid credentials
3. Click Login
Expected Result: System should display 'No network' error.

Test Scenario Description: Verify session timeout behavior after inactivity
Test Steps:
1. Log in
2. Stay inactive for 15 mins
3. Perform any action
Expected Result: User should be prompted to refresh session.

Test Scenario Description: Verify system locks account after multiple failed attempts
Test Steps:
1. Enter wrong password 5 times
2. Observe behavior
Expected Result: Account should be temporarily locked.

Test Scenario Description: Verify input validation for invalid password characters
Test Steps:
1. Enter password with invalid symbols (!@#...)
2. Click Login
Expected Result: System should reject invalid symbols.
